# WebKitCSSKeyframeRule

`WebKitCSSKeyframeRule` objects represent the style rule for a single keyframe in the @-webkit-keyframes CSS rule used in animations. The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/webkitjs/webkitanimationevent] class encapsulate information about running animations.

## Accessing Properties

- **keyText**: A keyframe selector.
- **style**: The style associated with this keyframe.

items.description: The style associated with this keyframe.
items.name: style
